Linkes: So, I explain to you the task. I'll give you device for searching of treasure , with which you have to find Suspicious Mechanisms . Then you should move to the upper floor of the Tower of Cruma. If you kill Martesa and it will extract from the The core of the body Martesa , you can come back. Why? .. Do not you understand? It seemed to me that there is no need for a long explanation... Anything you do not understand? If so, do not hesitate to ask.
